name: A Hunky Dory Story
description:
Here is the story of A Hunky Dory:

You're a small hunky fish that needs to go home.

Easier said than done because there's obstacles at every step.

Enjoy this simple one touch arcade game, made in pixel artstyle that you and your kids will love.

Features:

- endless fun
- one touch gameplay
- simple logic
- cool sounds
- chilling mood
- made for kids

Thanks for downloading. If you like this game, please go ahead and rate it, that helps us a lot!
